title: I lost some of my emotes?
body: I checked my game this morning and I had lost a bunch of my emotes (as in they wont show up on emote wheel/in collection). Noteably the ones that were gifted via some sort of event. But my friends told me they had lost the emotes that they had bought too. Is anyone else experiencing the same things?

replies.body: Me too, after gaining an honour capsule literally minutes ago, all my emotes are gone except for "happy to see you" (which I just received from capsule upon login) and that peace poro emote. tried looking up the unowned emotes to see if my lost emotes were somehow put back into the pool there but nope, not even there, not even the thumbs up emote that we all got.
Riot is aware and working on a fix, nothing else we could do, just gotta sit tight and await the fix.

Hi! 

This is definitely a weird issue, did you try restarting the client to see if they'd re-appear?

If they still haven't reappeared after the restart;

Explain your issue as coherent as possible to avoid being asked further questions in the request.  Be sure to mention you've already restarted the client and this did not solve the issue.

Hiya restarting didn't fix it. This issue seems to be client side because you can still use emotes in game. I just got home and checked again and the issue is still there.
Riot is aware and working on a fix, nothing else we could do, just gotta sit tight and await the fix.

Same thing here, was just seeing if anybody else was having the same problem. 

Just wanna jam my new emotes yknow
